# i18n Instructions

## Comprehensive Documentation

**⚠️ CRITICAL**: This repository contains comprehensive i18n documentation in `/docs/i18n/`. **Always consult these comprehensive guides first** for implementation details, patterns, and examples.

### i18n Implementation

- **Next.js with next-intl**: Setup and usage of internationalization using the next-intl library for multi-language support.
  - See: [docs/i18n/next-intl.internationalization.md](../../docs/i18n/next-intl.internationalization.md) - Complete guide to next-intl setup, server/client usage, and message structure
- **File Organization**: How i18n files are structured in this project.
  - See: [docs/i18n/file-organization.md](../../docs/i18n/file-organization.md)

- **Country Selection**: Country and flag data management.
  - See: [docs/i18n/Country-Selection-Utils.md](../../docs/i18n/Country-Selection-Utils.md) - Country selection utilities
  - See: [docs/i18n/Dynamic-Country_Flag-Data.md](../../docs/i18n/Dynamic-Country_Flag-Data.md) - Dynamic country flag data loading
  - See: [docs/i18n/eu-countries-configuration.md](../../docs/i18n/eu-countries-configuration.md) - EU countries configuration

## Quick Reference

**Client Components:**

```tsx
import { useTranslations } from "next-intl";
const t = useTranslations("Namespace");
```

**Server Components:**

```tsx
import { getTranslations } from "next-intl/server";
const t = await getTranslations("Namespace");
```

### Official next-intl Resources

For the latest upstream documentation:

- Official docs: https://next-intl-docs.vercel.app/

For more information on adding new languages or customizing the i18n setup, check the detailed documentation in `/docs/i18n/`.
